#MondayMotivation for #vaccination 💉
INJECT to PROTECT badgers against cattle b🐄TB spread 👍
(Unfortunately the cattle #vaccine is taking rather longer than our #COVID19 ones did ...)
Govt should #stopthecull now, not another 140,000 dead #wildlife later ‼️
#badgermonday 🦡 https://t.co/zz38kl45Bd
